name: Warm Caprese Zoodles
author: France C
summary: Caprese salad meets sauteed zucchini noodles in this super easy dish filled with basil, tomatoes, and gooey cheese.  Make sure all your ingredients are ready to go, because this will be ready fast. Take care not to overcook the zucchini noodles to prevent them from becoming mushy. Adjust the basil to your liking.
ingredients: 5 medium zucchini, run through a spiralizer
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 (8 ounce) container mini mozzarella balls, halved
¼ cup fresh basil, cut into thin strips
directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Add cherry tomatoes and quickly stir until tomatoes just begin to soften, 1 to 2 minutes
Add zucchini noodles, salt, and pepper
Keep cooking, stirring frequently, until zoodles are tender yet firm to the bite, 2 to 3 minutes
Remove from heat and stir in mozzarella and basil
Divide zoodles between 4 bowls and drizzle with balsamic glaze
